checklistDescription: Items for new members of product team.

readGuide.description: Read the Product Lead Guide. Don’t worry if everything doesn’t make sense yet. Bookmark it and plan to look at it again.

virtualCoffee.displayName: Virtual coffee with the Product Director
virtualCoffee.description: Come with a list of questions. Even broad ones are okay. You’re not expected to know how everything works just yet.

virtualPMcoffee.description: Have virtual coffees (or real ones!) with other PMs. Ask tons of questions. Listen a lot. And don’t be worried about reaching out. Everyone was a new hire.

readTrelloBoard.description: The Product Director will share the Product Team Trello board with you. Take a look to get a sense of the team's current priorities.

secondCoffee.displayName: Second coffee with the Product Director
secondCoffee.description: Ask the Director what projects you can start pairing with another Product Lead on. They can give you guidance on what this pairing might look like. You may also be ready to start looking for a project now and can discuss your interests with them at this time.

learnGitHub.description: Developing a better understanding of these tools and their various time-saving shortcuts will help you feel less lost. We have guides for them located in our handbook.

moreCoffees.description: Schedule more virtual coffees (or real ones) with other PMS to learn more. Ask tons of questions. Listen a lot. Don’t be nervous to reach out to people. Everyone was once in your shoes.

meetFacilitator.description: The Product Director will introduce you to your facilitator.

readHandbook.description: Get familiar with the 18F Handbook. You don't need to know everything but it's good to know what's in there for future reference.

attendFacilitatorGroupMeeting.description: Meet your Facilitator team and go to your first group meeting.

lookAtProjects.description: Your facilitator and director will talk to you about the project you'll be staffed on. For information on upcoming projects, look at 18F's staffing repository.

listenToCallCenter.displayName: Attend a Call Center Listen In Session
listenToCallCenter.description: Attend one of the Call Center Listen In sessions to hear real interactions between the public and the USA.gov call center. Details are in #call-center-listen-in.

ReadBeforeYouShip.description: Anyone who works with dev, devops, product, infrastucture, and design is required to read our Before you Ship guide. Make sure you've read the section on ATOs and if you have any questions, please ask in #devops.
